title: Fabien Galthié - Wikipedia
snippet: Galthié became the coach of Stade Français in 2004 after head coach Nick Mallet departed the Paris club. Galthié was contacted by Max Guazzini to take up the coaching job. title: Fabien Galthie: Ten things you should know about the France head coach
snippet: Fabien Galthie has overseen significant improvements in the France side since taking over as head coach following the 2019 Rugby World Cup.

title: Fabien Galthié

title: Fabien Galthié, the perfectionist masterminding France's Rugby World Cup tilt
